name: Liquid Drum and Bass
description: Atmospheric and melodic genre that developed in the early 2000s; utilizes polished and smooth production, simpler structures, and originally sampled Funk and Soul.

children.name: Sambass
children.description: Combines Drum and Bass tempos and drum patterns, in addition to its Funk and Soul influences, with various styles of Brazilian Music.
